summary: Young knight John travels the world in search of fame and fortune, but also to help others and prove himself. However, things go dire fast and he becomes burdened with life's hardships. But then he meets a pretty water nymph, Mary.
cast: Otakar Brousek|Antonín Procházka|Nada Konvalinková|Helena Vondrácková|Frantisek Filipovský|Jaroslav Moucka|Karel Semerád|Zdenek Vasek|Milos Vosmanský|Jana Tomecková|Hana Zaoralova|Jytte Abildstrøm|Jirí Jurina
title: Pohádka o Honzíkovi a Marence
